subject: Orders Order #SSN4321
description_text:
Hello, I see that the order is still not fulfilled due to lack of white
elastomer (?). Can you send it without it? I dont need them at all.

conversations.body_text: Hi Dawid Hagalaz,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Please provide a photo so we can verify with our warehouse. Additionally, if you no longer require the white elastomer, we can process a refund for that item.

Hello,

The package did not arrive yet.

I think this is due to lack of white elastomer (but im not sure)

Can you check what part is missing from order and holding it from being
sent? Kindly let me know.

Please advise when package will be sent and provide tracking number or
package number. Thank you!

Hi Dawid Hagalaz,    We sincerely apologize, but the pedals are currently sold out at our German warehouse. Shipping from China will incur customs duties. Therefore, we will ship your order after restocking at the German warehouse on Wednesday.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2533700709743204

Hi,

Okay understood, will compenastion be possible due to lack of sold out
information and prolonged shipping time when i picked express shipping?
Thanks.
Hi Dawid Hagalaz,  We will refund the additional shipping charges incurred.

Hello,

Thank you for help.

Can you kindly advise if I will automatically receive tracking number for
second package (pedals) or shall I contact you on friday 12.12.2025?

Hello,

Can you check if pedals have been sent from germany?

Hello,

I got information that pedal set is being sent from Germany. but there was
no pedals in stock and the new batch came on Tuesday 11.12.2025

I placed my order on 2.12.2025 with express shipping 5-7 days...

Please check whether the pedals were sent from Germany to my address in
Poland and share tracking number or give me information where are they.

Thank you.
